programme.title: Presidential Inauguration
programme.short_synopsis: The presidential inaugurations from George Washington (1789) to Bill Clinton (1997).
programme.medium_synopsis: Presidential inaugurations - from George Washington's 1789 pomp and parade, to Andrew Jackson's drunken brawl, to finally Bill Clinton's home-grown vegetable dinner.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
